definition.text: Stop loss is the current stop loss target, as defined in the manage stage of the corresponding strategy.

translations.text: Stop loss es el objetivo actual de stop loss, según se define en la etapa de gestión de la estrategia correspondiente.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode.
initialValue allows resetting the initial state of the node to an arbitrary value.
